questions.quote: You guys, I ordered some chocolate pies from that bakery on Bleecker. Could you pick them up for me?
That's like the pervert motto! Yeah! Yeah! They have you raise your right hand, put your left hand down your pants, and repeat that!
Good for you! And hey, I thought your paper on punctuated equilibrium in the Devonian era was top notch!
What?! You can't shed a tear for your dead wife!! Now, I left you a note from the beyond!
But what about all the "finding-his-flaws" stuff we've been doing?
I'm full, and yet I know if I stop eating this, I'll regret it.
I want you to meet someone really special. Phoebe, this is Erica. And this is the baby!
Okay, you go do it! I'll come back to that set! I'll meet more actors! I'll meet 'em all!
Thanks, that would be great. Hey, honey, wouldn't that be great?
I don't know, she seemed to think it was such a crazy idea! Um, plus, she, uh, she got me taffy!
